pullrequest.title: fix for issue #444, multisense joint states and tf transform missing

content.raw: with this change, do we still need the remaps and relays (from `/joint_states` to `/multisense/joint_states`) in [atlas_v3_bringup.launch](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/2df318b039f040dca6b430534dd104abd7a23cc7/drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_v3_bringup.launch?at=default) and [atlas_v4_bringup.launch](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/2df318b039f040dca6b430534dd104abd7a23cc7/drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_v4_bringup.launch?at=default) files?
content.html: with this change, do we still need the remaps and relays (from /joint_states to /multisense/joint_states) in atlas_v3_bringup.launch and atlas_v4_bringup.launch files?
